title: Godwin Finds Out He Has Diabetes
description:
Uncle Si identifies the culprit behind Godwin's diabetes, and Godwin talks about the diagnosis taking him by surprise. John-David's jaw drops at Si's unexpected reaction to Martin's latest trail cam pics of a "black panther." Godwin shares a Robertson family tale about what a young Si Robertson did with 100 golf balls. Si tries to explain phone chargers with questionable results. Godwin discovers a great reason to believe in ghosts. And the boys have tips on making a long-distance relationship work and how to stay positive when times are tough.
